articles.title: Bharat Biotech, Sydney ID announce MoU to advance vaccine research initiative - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The agreement aims to build strong sectoral and cross-organisational collaborations to design novel methodologies to tackle future epidemics and infectious diseases, Bharat Biotech said in a statement.

articles.title: Tunnel Rescue Official Was Told Rat-Hole Mining Is Illegal. Watch His Response - NDTV
articles.description: Uttarkashi Tunnel Rescue Live: The rat-hole mining technique, which was outlawed in 2014, was used to clear the last few meters in the operation to rescue 41 workers trapped in the collapsed Silkyara tunnel in Uttarakhand for the last 17 days.
articles.content:
The mining practice came to the rescue after heavy machines broke down.
